stories.name: story-url-object-summary
stories.description: Show a summary of a URL with follower count, Embedly data, image, link, etc.

stories.name: story-hashtag-object-summary
stories.description: Show a summary of a hashtag with follower count, link to Twitter, etc.

stories.name: story-user-summary
stories.description: Show a summary of a user with follower count, avatar, link to Twitter, etc.

stories.name: story-enterprise-login
stories.description: Register domain, invite users and create objects and tags

stories.name: story-newsfeed-homepage
stories.description: Show the latest activity from my friends and things I follow

stories.name: story-user-timeline
stories.description: Show the latest activity from a particular user

stories.name: story-object-timeline
stories.description: Show the latest activity about a particular object

stories.name: story-add-comment
stories.description: Add a comment about an object

stories.name: story-parse-comments
stories.description: Convert @names, hashtags and URLs into links in comment text

stories.name: story-add-web-comment
stories.description: Add a comment about the current web page

stories.name: story-selection-updates-sidebar
stories.description: Load the selected object into the sidebar

stories.name: story-data-notification
stories.description: Show a notification when comments or static data about the current page is available

stories.name: story-tag-scraping
stories.description: Interrogate pages to discover tags we can use to discover relevant content

stories.name: story-toggle-sidebar
stories.description: Let the user easily show/hide the sidebar

stories.name: story-comment-source
stories.description: Describe how the comment entered your stream and provide options to unfollow the source object(s)

stories.name: story-animate-sidebar-chrome
stories.description: Smoothly slide the sidebar in and out

stories.name: story-sidebar-options
stories.description: Options to put sidebar on left or right, control timeouts, etc.
